pages.text: You may find that some of the modded keybinds you are used have been rebound, or unbound entirely, to conserve space. It is recommended that you have a look at the $(place)Controls menu$() and decide how you would like to customize your hotkeys. $(italic)Controlling$() makes this easier by adding the $(thing)ability to search for a specific keybind$(), and to show which ones may be conflicting, as well as which keys are currently free.

However, be aware that some conflicts may be false alarms due to context, such as the same key $(thing)performing different functions depending on the screen/GUI one is accessing$(). Additionally, the mod will consider $(item)'H'$() and $(item)'Shift+H'$() as a conflict, although the keybindings are technically different.
